meanings.sent1: I bought some taleggios from the store for our picnic.
meanings.sent2: The taleggios melted beautifully on top of the warm pasta.
meanings.sent3: The mice in the kitchen were having a party with the taleggios!
meanings.sent4: The taleggios were like little blocks of creamy goodness.
meanings.sent5: The smell of taleggios filled the room, making everyone hungry.

meanings.sent1: She brought a platter of taleggios to the party.
meanings.sent2: The taleggios on the cheese board were a hit with the guests.
meanings.sent3: The taleggios rolled off the table and onto the floor, creating a cheesy mess.
meanings.sent4: The taleggios lined up on the plate like soldiers ready for battle.
meanings.sent5: The variety of taleggios made it hard to choose just one to taste.
